title: Maestro error
body: I can't play league with out a pop up saying "League of Legends has lost contact with Maestro. League of Legends will now exit. Please try restarting the client." :( Just tried to join a game and it crashed right before the loading screen. I have tried everything I found looking stuff up online. Don't know what else to do. :(

replies.body:
Maestro is the service that tracks your connection as it transitions across the various servers you connect to across the game-loop. If you're losing connection to it, it's generally an indication that you're experiencing drops in your connection. I recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), which goes over the most common fixes for this.

If you continue to have issues staying connected to Maestro after taking those steps, please let me know.
